Annotation: Medical Issues - Complication developed in the hospital

Jargon Term: You need to come to the hospital on Tuesday [**2172-4-8**] to have your platelet count drawn.
START Prednisone 80 mg daily. You should continue this regimen until your heme/onc follow-up appointment. At that time, you can discuss your prednisone regimen with your doctor.
START Iron 325 mg three times a day
START Pantoprazole 40 mg daily. You should continue to take this to protect your stomach while you are on steroids.
